artist: Artist: Frances Flora Palmer; Artist: after H. D. Manning; Publisher: R. Rogerson, Leeds, England , for Yorkshire Fine Art Distribution. Leeds; Printer: Yates and Co., London
creditline: Gift of funds from Dennis Michael Jon
description: two steamships on a river; nightscape with moon and clouds; shore with trees at L; one boat labeled "Lincoln," one labeled "Davies"
inscription: Printed title, bottom margin: A MIDNIGHT RACE ON THE MISSISSIPPI
provenance: U.S. Bank, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 2003.
title: A Midnight Race on the Mississippi
